name: ColorShips (MatthewLacker)
description:
Local multiplayer competitive abstract painting flight simulator!

Try cover as much ground as possible!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

Player 1 (Left): W to accelerate, A and D to rotate

Player 2 (right): UP arrow to accelerate, LEFT and RIGHT to rotate

Press M to toggle sounds

-Fly over your home base to refuel on paint power

-Fly over your opponents base to lose all your paint power

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
